# Introduction {-}

```{r fig.align='center', echo=FALSE, include=identical(knitr:::pandoc_to(), 'html'), fig.link='https://www.crcpress.com/product/isbn/9781138700109'}
knitr::include_graphics('images/cover.jpeg', dpi = NA)
```


This guide describes the methods used at the MPCA to analyze air monitoring and modeling data. The charts and code found in this guide were produced using the freely available R statistical software. To follow along with the examples, you can download a copy of R to your computer from the [r-project](https://cran.r-project.org/) or open [R-Fiddle](http://www.r-fiddle.org/#/) in your browser.
